author: froukje2017
title: Vey pleasant stay and excellent staff!
text:
I would like to recommend this hotel! It has a good central location, nicely decorated rooms, comfortable stay, lovely rooftop terrace and an excellent staff who really helped out with my requests. As an example of this superb hospitality: at home I realized I forget some item of my Luggage at the hotel. Thanks to signor Roberto and his colleguaes of the staff I received today a package by post. They were very kind to put in such extra effort for their guest! Grazie mille! I am very happy with this hotel.
Room Tip: Personally I prefer upper floor non-smoking rooms! See more room tips
